File libsrc/libcssio/dcpress.c

Public Function Index

longdcpress (long, const char *, long *)
Decompress compressed data.
rmfdif (int, long *, long *)
Remove the first-difference on long data.

Public Functions

longdcpress 
 int longdcpress(long numin,
                 const char *in,
                 long *out)
Decompress compressed data. Data is returned as an array of long ints. This is an 8-bit version. compression technique

Parameters:
numin - The number of characters in the input character string.
in - The input string of characters containing compressed data.
out - The ouput array of long ints containing decompressed data.
Returns:
The number of floating point words in out.
rmfdif 
 void rmfdif(int num,
             long *in,
             long *out)
Remove the first-difference on long data. Second differences can be removed by calling this routine twice.

Parameters:
num - The number of data values input.
in - The input data array.
out - The output data array.
